title: Robert Mugabe’s son charged with attempted murder over Johannesburg shooting
title_cn: 罗伯特·穆加贝的儿子因约翰内斯堡枪击案被控谋杀未遂
author: Rachel Savage in Johannesburg

paragraphs.en_text: A son of the late Zimbabwean president Robert Mugabe has been charged with attempted murder after a 23-year-old man was allegedly shot in the back on 19 February in an upmarket area of Johannesburg.
paragraphs.cn_text: 据称，2 月 19 日，一名 23 岁的津巴布韦总统罗伯特·穆加贝 (Robert Mugabe) 的儿子在约翰内斯堡的一个高档地区背部遭到枪击，被指控谋杀未遂。

sentences.en_text: A son of the late Zimbabwean president Robert Mugabe has been charged with attempted murder after a 23-year-old man was allegedly shot in the back on 19 February in an upmarket area of Johannesburg.
sentences.cn_text: 据称，2 月 19 日，一名 23 岁的津巴布韦总统罗伯特·穆加贝 (Robert Mugabe) 的儿子在约翰内斯堡的一个高档地区背部遭到枪击，被指控谋杀未遂。

paragraphs.en_text: Bellarmine Chatunga Mugabe, 28, appeared in court on Monday for a brief hearing alongside co-accused Tobias Mugabe Matonhodze. Mugabe’s lawyer Sinenhlanhla Mnguni declined to comment when asked by reporters whether the two men were related. Mnguni said he would request bail for his clients at the next hearing on 3 March.
paragraphs.cn_text: 28 岁的贝拉明·查通加·穆加贝 (Bellarmine Chatunga Mugabe) 周一出庭，与同案被告托比亚斯·穆加贝·马通霍泽 (Tobias Mugabe Matonhodze) 一起出席简短的听证会。 当记者询问这两人是否有关联时，穆加贝的律师西尼兰拉·姆古尼拒绝置评。 姆古尼表示，他将在 3 月 3 日举行的下一次听证会上为他的客户申请保释。

paragraphs.en_text: Mugabe and his older brother Robert Junior became notorious in the 2010s for sharing their lavish lifestyles online. In 2017, the younger Mugabe posted a photograph of his watch on Instagram with the caption: “$60,000 on the wrist when your daddy run the whole country ya know!!!” Shortly after, a video circulated of him dousing the watch with champagne.
paragraphs.cn_text: 穆加贝和他的哥哥小罗伯特在 2010 年代因在网上分享他们奢华的生活方式而臭名昭著。 2017年，小穆加贝在Instagram上发布了一张他的手表的照片，并配文：“当你爸爸统治整个国家时，手腕上有6万美元，你知道！！！”不久之后，一段他在手表上浇上香槟的视频流传开来。

paragraphs.en_text: A state prosecutor said at the hearing on Monday that the gun allegedly used in the shooting had not yet been found. He added that investigations were “far from over”.
paragraphs.cn_text: 一名州检察官在周一的听证会上表示，据称在枪击事件中使用的枪支尚未找到。 他补充说，调查“远未结束”。

paragraphs.en_text: Mugabe and Matonhodze, 33, have also been charged with obstructing justice, illegal possession of a firearm and ammunition, contraventions of the Immigration Act on suspicion of being in South Africa illegally, and theft, said Magaboke Mohlatlole, a national prosecuting authority spokesperson.
paragraphs.cn_text: 国家检察机关发言人马加博克·莫赫拉特洛勒 (Magaboke Mohlatlole) 表示，穆加贝和 33 岁的马托霍泽还被指控妨碍司法公正、非法持有枪支弹药、涉嫌非法入境南非而违反《移民法》以及盗窃罪。

paragraphs.en_text: Regarding the theft charge, Mohlatlole said: “After [the alleged victim] got shot, he tried to flee. He went outside of the gate and then he fell. After falling, one of the accused went and took the remote [for the gate] from him.”
paragraphs.cn_text: 关于盗窃指控，莫拉特洛尔说：“[所谓的受害者]被枪杀后，他试图逃跑。 他出了门，然后摔倒了。 摔倒后，其中一名被告走过去，从他手中夺走了[大门]遥控器。”

paragraphs.en_text: The man who was shot is still in hospital and is being watched over by police, a police spokesperson, Dimakatso Nevhuhulwi, told the national broadcaster SABC before the hearing. When the men were arrested, police said they believed the victim was an employee at the house in Hyde Park, a plush suburb where South Africa’s president, Cyril Ramaphosa, also has a home.
paragraphs.cn_text: 警方发言人 Dimakatso Nevhuhulwi 在听证会前对国家广播公司 SABC 表示，中枪男子仍在医院，并受到警方看护。 当这些人被捕时，警方表示，他们相信受害者是海德公园一所房子的雇员，海德公园是一个豪华的郊区，南非总统西里尔·拉马福萨也在那里拥有住宅。

paragraphs.en_text: Robert Mugabe ruled Zimbabwe for almost 40 years until he was deposed in a coup in 2017. He died two years later aged 95 .
paragraphs.cn_text: 罗伯特·穆加贝统治津巴布韦近 40 年，直到 2017 年政变被废黜。 两年后他去世，享年 95 岁。

sentences.en_text: Robert Mugabe ruled Zimbabwe for almost 40 years until he was deposed in a coup in 2017.

sentences.en_text: He died two years later aged 95 .
sentences.cn_text: 两年后他去世，享年 95 岁。

paragraphs.en_text: He came to power as a hero, having ended white minority rule in Zimbabwe . However, his rule turned to tyranny and corruption and he presided over hyperinflation and economic collapse.
paragraphs.cn_text: 他作为英雄上台，结束了津巴布韦白人少数群体的统治。 然而，他的统治转向了暴政和腐败，导致了恶性通货膨胀和经济崩溃。

paragraphs.en_text: His widow, Grace Mugabe, who was 40 years his junior, is notorious for her expensive taste . Reported property purchases in Johannesburg, Singapore, Dubai and Malaysia, and a rumoured £75,000 shopping spree in Paris, earned her the nickname “Gucci Grace”.
paragraphs.cn_text: 他的遗孀格蕾丝·穆加贝比他小 40 岁，因其昂贵的品味而臭名昭著。 据报道，她在约翰内斯堡、新加坡、迪拜和马来西亚购买了房产，还有传闻在巴黎花费 75,000 英镑疯狂购物，这为她赢得了“Gucci Grace”的绰号。

paragraphs.en_text: She avoided a court case in South Africa in 2017 by invoking diplomatic immunity . The model Gabriella Engels accused the former first lady of hitting her with an electric cable until she bled after she went to meet the Mugabe brothers at a hotel. Grace denied the allegations .
paragraphs.cn_text: 2017年，她通过援引外交豁免权避免了南非的一场法庭诉讼。 模特加布里埃拉·恩格斯指责前第一夫人在去酒店会见穆加贝兄弟后用电缆打她，直到她流血。 格蕾丝否认了这些指控。

paragraphs.en_text: In 2023, Robert Junior was arrested for allegedly causing £10,000 of damage to cars and other property at a party in Zimbabwe’s capital, Harare. Last year, he was fined for possessing cannabis after being arrested while driving the wrong way down a one-way street.
paragraphs.cn_text: 2023 年，小罗伯特因涉嫌在津巴布韦首都哈拉雷的一次聚会上对汽车和其他财产造成 10,000 英镑的损坏而被捕。 去年，他在单行道上逆行行驶时被捕，并因持有大麻而被罚款。
